name: Ella's Cauldron
description:
the potion game i made on stream

how 2 play:

- press start

- make a potion by adding 3 unique ingredients to the cauldron

- plants will regrow as time passes

- use the bed and certain other items to pass the time

- plants grow at their own pace, so don't rush them, ok?

- cat wanders around as time passes

- click the parchment on the table to check your progress

- the extras are unlocked when you've made all 120 potions. it's not really worth it though.

Thank you for playing!
